con:call.name: CheckIn Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.CheckIn.Request">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:CheckIn>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:CheckInRequest>\r <rad:SecurityGUID>?</rad:SecurityGUID>\r <rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad:CarrierCode>\r <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>?</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:ClientIPAddress>?</rad:ClientIPAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:HistoricUserName>?</rad:HistoricUserName>\r <rad1:ActionType>?</rad1:ActionType>\r <rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad:SeriesNumber>?</rad:SeriesNumber>\r <rad:ConfirmationNumber>?</rad:ConfirmationNumber>\r </rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad1:CheckInDetails>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad1:CheckInDetail>\r <rad1:ReservationKey>?</rad1:ReservationKey>\r <rad1:LogicalFlightKey>?</rad1:LogicalFlightKey>\r <rad1:PhysicalFlightKey>?</rad1:PhysicalFlightKey>\r <rad1:CustomerKey>?</rad1:CustomerKey>\r <rad1:AirLinePersonKey>?</rad1:AirLinePersonKey>\r <rad1:SeatAssignmentKey>?</rad1:SeatAssignmentKey>\r </rad1:CheckInDetail>\r </rad1:CheckInDetails>\r </tem:CheckInRequest>\r </tem:CheckIn>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
